file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 38-10-03-04 - FAUCET - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FAUCET - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the faucet assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 38-10-03-000-801-A FAUCET ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL ALL 38-10-03-400-801-A FAUCET ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 38-10-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 38-10-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FAUCET ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the faucet assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-15-01-600-802-A/300 WATER TANK - DRAINING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 271 Lavatory 272 Lavatory D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Drain the water tank ( AMM TASK 12-15-01-600-802-A/300). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Open the door (2). (2) Remove the spring (4) from the clamp (3). (3) Loosen the screw (7) that attaches the plunger rod (8) to the clamp (6). (4) Loosen the nut (9). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 38-10-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Remove the nut (10) and split lock washer (11) that attach the faucet (1) to the clamp (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 38-10-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Faucet Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONES 271 272 A 1. FAUCET 2. DOOR B 11. SPLIT LOCK WASHER 3. CLAMP DET. A 10. NUT 4. SPRING 9. NUT 5. WASHBASIN VALVE 6. CLAMP ACTUATOR LEVER SUPPLY LINE (REF.) 7. SCREW DET. B 8. PLUNGER ROD 145AMM380040.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 38-10-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 38-10-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. FAUCET ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the faucet assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-15-01-600-801-A/300 WATER TANK - FILLING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 271 Lavatory 272 Lavatory D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the faucet (1) in position. (2) Put the clamp (3) in position. (3) Tighten the nut (10) and split lock washer (11) that attach the faucet (1) to the clamp (3). (4) Connect the nut (9) that attaches the faucet (1) to the supply line. (5) Tighten the screw (7) that attaches the plunger rod (8) to the clamp (6). (6) Attach the spring (4) to the clamp (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 38-10-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do a check for leaks. (2) Service the water tank ( AMM TASK 12-15-01-600-801-A/300). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 38-10-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
